component.name: addSheet
component.description: Add a sheet or multiple sheets to a spreadsheet.

component.name: deleteSheet
component.description: Remove a sheet or multiple sheets from a given spreadsheet.

component.name: copySheet
component.description: Copies a single sheet from a spreadsheet to another spreadsheet.

component.name: getSheetMetadata
component.description: Provides a feed to access the sheet metadata contained within a given spreadsheet.
